meanings.definition: A photograph transmitted electronically over a wire or radio signal.
meanings.sent1: The wirephoto showed a clear image of the event.
meanings.sent2: I received a wirephoto of the famous landmark.
meanings.sent3: The wirephoto of the cat wearing glasses made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her smile in the wirephoto was a beacon of happiness.
meanings.sent5: The wirephoto captured the essence of the sunset beautifully.

meanings.definition: The process of transmitting photographs electronically over a wire or radio signal.
meanings.sent2: We learned about wirephoto in our history class.
meanings.sent3: The wirephoto process seemed like magic to the students.
meanings.sent4: In a world of words, wirephoto was a silent messenger.
meanings.sent5: The wirephoto transmission was swift and efficient.
